snippet.title: Maelstrom Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The grim fantasy naval battles of Maelstrom will come to Steam Early Access on April 11, 2018! If you want to set sail sooner, you can get a discount, access to beta tests, and other rewards by backing our Kickstarter!

Captain a Human, Orc or Dwarven warship and join tactical free for all battles in search of loot to upgrade your crew and equipment. Keep your best armour facing the enemy, use the different ammunition types wisely, and avoid or exploit the dangers of the magical Abyssal Ocean.

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2006538134/maelstrom-monstrous-fantasy-naval-combat
Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/764050
